Packages that use CompanyRepresentative
Package
Description
boundary
Contains all boundary (view) classes that interact with the user.
controller
Contains all control classes that execute operations dedicated to the user type.
main
Contains main application class that serves as entry-point to application.
util
Contains all utility classes that can be used throughout application as required.
